titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation declaring His Majesties resolution for settling a speedy peace by a good accommodation, and an invitation to all his loyall subjects to joyne together for his assistance therein
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Bracketed imprint information suggested by Wing.
"Given at our court at Chard the 30. day of September 1644."
Imperfect: stained, with partial loss of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
